extendedInfo.description: Turn donw and up your smartphone as a card deck ... who will turn the highest card, will win!!!It is said that good luck is blind ... instead it sees very well.You can decide who will turn the highest card depending on the number of times the cards will be shuffled.Enjoy yourself challenging your friends to extract a card higher than your poor '2'.It is recommended to download before the free version to check the compatibility of your smartphone. The free version allows you to extract only randomly chosen cards.

reviews.title: Bullshit
reviews.comment: When i open the game , \'no Orientation sensor \' shows....
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Stupid
reviews.comment: No point to the game when you are alone!
reviews.author: Jenifer Smith
